sqlReaderQuery.value: SELECT TOP 1 COLUMN_NAME FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME ='@{pipeline().parameters.tablename}' AND TABLE_SCHEMA = 'dbo' AND COLUMN_NAME  LIKE '%ID%' ;

scripts.text:
DELETE FROM dbo.emp
WHERE EmployeeID IN (
    SELECT EmployeeID
    FROM (
        SELECT EmployeeID,
               ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY Name, Age, Department ORDER BY EmployeeID DESC) AS row_num
        FROM dbo.emp
    ) AS subquery
    WHERE row_num > 1
)

scriptLines: contact as (mail as string, mobile as long),
query: 'select max(EmployeeID) as MaxEmpID from dbo.emp',
stringifyContact parse({contact information} = contact ? (mail as string,

value.value:
@concat(activity('Set LogFile')?.Error?.message,'|',activity('Get Metadata Of LogFile')?.Error?.message,'|',activity('Data flow with logfile')?.Error?.message,'|',activity('Data flow without logfile')?.Error?.message
)
